DOC.brief_summary: This is a registry of patients diagnosed with pulmonary arterial hypertension, scheduled for treatment with Ventavis. Typical clinical measures and quality of life will be prospectively followed in 12 months period.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Ventavis Used in Real-life Setting.
DOC.criteria: Pulmonary arterial hypertension Age 18+ Patients newly treated with Ventavis or switched from sildenafil Retrospective documentation is not allowed
